com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget
Class WPToggleSwitch

java.lang.Object
  SeekBar
      com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget.WPToggleSwitch

public class WPToggleSwitch
extends SeekBar

Note: this widget works reliably on Android 4.0 ICS and above, but it has known issues with rotation and color changing on older firmware.

Toggle Switches are analogous to Android's ToggleButton and are implemented as a SeekBar that snaps dicotimously to either end. It is checked when the thumb is rightmost and the background is filled with the current theme color, and it is not checked when the thumb is leftmost and the background is black. Version 1.1

  • Added OnCheckedChangeListener to play better with CompoundButton.
  • Custom touch handling to support "click-to-toggle."

Since:
04-19-2012
